channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for UT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for UT

item.title: Report X-2023100392
item.description:
Report X-2023100392

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-07T18:15:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-29
  • City: OREM
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER WAS CALLED OUT TO A SPILL ON THE IRREG SLIDE. 5 GALLON BUCKET WAS LEAKING A SMALL AMOUNT OF CLEAR LIQUID FROM IT'S SIDE. BUCKET WAS PLACED INTO A LINED SPILL TRAY AND TRASPORTED TO THE DMP AREA FOR PROCESSING.

item.title: Report X-2023090167
item.description:
Report X-2023090167

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-04T06:23:51+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-06
  • City: SALT LAKE CITY
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDED TO THREE PACKAGES THAT WERE COLD TO THE TOUCH. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED SEVERAL POUNDS DRY ICE COOLING MEAT. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOXES TO INDICATE DRY ICE WAS BEING SHIPPED. ADDITIONAL TRACKING NUMBERS TO VARIOUS CONSIGNEES IN THE USA ARE 1Z848E4Y0139558306 AND 1Z848E4Y0101993237. THESE PACKAGES HAVE NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
